SuperstitioMod:DelayHpLosePower_HealOnVi.NAME: #rCorruption
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of enemy turn: NL #rLose #r%d #rHP. NL Total Corruption: #r%d stacks.

SuperstitioMod:DoubleRemoveHpLostWhenHas.NAME: Double Block
DESCRIPTIONS: While you have #yVulnerable, the amount of #rCorruption removed by cards and #yBlock gained from cards are both doubled.

SuperstitioMod:LostBodyPart_Arm.NAME: Severed Arm
DESCRIPTIONS_SFW: Cannot play Elbow Jab or Rising Dragon Fist.

SuperstitioMod:LostBodyPart_Breast.NAME: Breast Severed
DESCRIPTIONS_SFW: Cannot play Mulan Missile or Monkey Fist.

SuperstitioMod:LostBodyPart_Castration.NAME: Castrated
DESCRIPTIONS_SFW: Cannot play Swallow Fist or Kite Fist.

SuperstitioMod:AtDeathDoor.NAME: On Death's Door
DESCRIPTIONS: Immune to HP loss and Thorns damage.

MAKE_KEYWORDS.DESCRIPTION: Immune to HP loss and Thorns damage.
